verbose_text: Another investigation sought a relationship between p53 levels and Maspin expression in vivo in breast and colon adenocarcinomas, lung cancer, prostatic and ovarian adenocarcinomas, lymphoma, and melanoma, finding that Maspin expression correlated inversely with mutant p53 level in most of these cancers; the authors suggested that Maspin is probably a p53 target gene in vivo [XREF_BIBR].
